1.title: Paul's Thanksgiving and Prayer
1.keyEvent: Paul expresses gratitude and prays for the Philippians' growth

2.title: Christ's Humility and Exaltation
2.keyEvent: Exhortation to unity modeled on Christ's humility

3.title: Righteousness Through Faith
3.keyEvent: Paul warns against legalism and stresses faith in Christ

4.title: Joy and Peace in Christ
4.keyEvent: Encouragement to rejoice and trust God in all circumstances
